europeana:record.dc:title: Het zweefvliegduo Eupeodes bucculatus en E. goeldlini in Nederland (Diptera: Syrphidae).
Nederlandse Faunistische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Reemer M.
Steenis, van J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
zweefvliegen
Syrphidae
Nederland
verspreiding
europeana:record.dc:description: The sibling syrphids Eupeodes bucculatus and E. goeldlini in the Netherlands (Diptera: Syrphidae) Recently, the hoverfly Eupeodes goeldlini Mazánek, Láska & Bicˇik, 1999 has been described, a species very similar to E. bucculatus (Rondani, 1857). This paper gives the first records of E. goeldlini for the Netherlands. The distribution of both species in the Netherlands is discussed and some comments are made on characters to distinguish the species.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Het zweefvliegduo Eupeodes bucculatus en E. goeldlini in Nederland (Diptera: Syrphidae). (URN:ISSN:01692453) (Volume 25)
